packages.notes: Student need to present their college or school ID proof compulsory at the reservation counter.
packages.description: Get ready for a fun-filled day of water adventures! Your pass includes both Adventure Lagoon and H20 Play Park Rides at Entartica Sea World, Mayfair, Raipur.

inclusions: A complimentary food voucher worth Rs. 180 (Redeemable at the food court)
packages.description: Get ready for a fun-filled day of water adventures! Your pass includes both Adventure Lagoon and H20 Play Park Rides at Entartica Sea World, Mayfair, Raipur.

amenities.description: Get ready for an exciting day of water adventures! Our pass includes both Adventure Lagoon and H20 Play Park rides. Whether you're an adult seeking thrills or a kid ready for water fun, we've got you covered.
amenities.safety: Life jackets provided for water activities
amenities.note: Children under 3 enter free with a paying adult.
whatToBring: A valid, government-issued photo ID for entry
Swimwear suitable for a family-friendly environment
Sun protection, including sunscreen and hats
Towels and a change of clothes for post-adventure comfort (or you can buy from merchandise)
parkRules: Follow lifeguard instructions and safety signage at all times
Glass containers and alcoholic beverages are strictly prohibited
Please use provided trash receptacles to keep the park clean
Pets are not allowed within the park premises, with the exception of service animals
Enter and exit at specified points

activities: Private Yacht Boat Ride for One Hour
packages.description: Chartering a yacht boat for your celebrations promises an exclusive and unforgettable experience. Whether itâ€™s a private family ride, a romantic proposal, or an anniversary celebration, our yacht boat offers a serene and luxurious setting on the water.
